forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 13 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 12 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

weather_report:
This morning in Downtown San Francisco, the sky opens up mostly sunny, inviting the city to awaken in a soft embrace of warmth. The expected high of 65 degrees feels refreshing, especially as the afternoon promises a gentle dip to around 63, reminiscent of a cool breeze from the ocean. The west-southwest wind whistles through the streets, ranging between 13 to 24 mph, urging those strolling or commuting to keep an aware eye on their hats and hair, as occasional gusts could sneak up to 30 mph.

As the sun arches its back into evening, clouds will gather like thoughtful musings, settling in with a low around 57 degrees. While the day begins with clarity, small whispers of fog may linger at the edges, teasing the edges of the Golden Gate Bridge and wrapping around the hills in the distance. Dressed in light layers, one might opt for a comfortable sweater beneath a light jacket, ideal for transitioning from the sunlit hours into the cooler evening. The day beckons gentle avenues of exploration—perhaps a leisurely walk along the waterfront or a visit to an outdoor café, where one can sip a warming beverage while watching the fog invite itself into the city, creating a kaleidoscope of atmosphere as the sun sets.
